snippet: Al Jazeera condemned what it described as “an attempt to demonize” two of its reporters, Peter Greste and Mohamed Fahmy, with the release of video recorded during their arrest in December in Cairo.
abstract: Al Jazeera condemned what it described as “an attempt to demonize” two of its reporters, Peter Greste and Mohamed Fahmy, with the release of video recorded during their arrest in December in Cairo.

headline.main: Dutch Reporter Is Forced to Flee Egypt as Pursuit of Al Jazeera Journalists Snares More Victims
